de.must.markup
Class MustMenuItem

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.Vector<MustMenuNode>
              de.must.markup.MustMenuNode
                  de.must.markup.MustMenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<MustMenuNode>, java.util.Collection<MustMenuNode>, java.util.List<MustMenuNode>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class MustMenuItem
extends MustMenuNode

Menu item. May be represented by an icon or by text. May be embedded in a tree with menus and submenus or in a tool bar.

See Also:
Serialized Form
